description: Primary OSG compute element resource at TTU.  Consists of a mix of dual-core dual-cpu and quad-core dual-cpu Xeons, 240 cores total, operating at 2.5 to 3.0 GHz and associated with a cluster-wide Lustre file system.  The file system is also accessible through the associated TTU-SIGMORGH storage element.

name: UColorado_ITB
description: I would like to add a host to be used for ITB testing. At present, I plan to install CE OSG 1.2.1 in order to help with some recently proposed testing to the CMS workflow, lcg utils. I imagine that use of this machine will change depending on its participation in ITB. Currently, hepitb01.colorado.edu is not in the DNS tables. It should be propagated by tomorrow.
